## Set up

```{r}

#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
#| label: import

taylor_files_list <- list.files(
  "data-processed-taylor",
  pattern = ".csv",
  full.names = T
)

taylor_files_list
```

```{r}
#| label: combine-files 

taylor_songs <- taylor_files_list |> map(
  read_csv,
  col_types = cols(album = col_character())
) |> list_rbind() |> 
  clean_names()

taylor_songs |> glimpse()
```

```{r}
albums <- str_split_1(params$album, ",")
```

Album Names: `r params$album` 
Use this to check your work ^

```{r}
songs <- taylor_songs |> filter(album %in% albums)

```
